verses.verse: וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt שָׂרֵֽי־ <S%H8269><s%> And the rulers הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem וּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> the rest הָ֠עָם <S%H5971><s%> of the people הִפִּ֨ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> also cast גוֹרָל֜וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots לְהָבִ֣יא ׀ <S%H935><s%> to bring אֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הָעֲשָׂרָ֗ה <S%H6235><s%> of ten לָשֶׁ֙בֶת֙ <S%H3427><s%> to dwell בִּֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy וְתֵ֥שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> and nine הַיָּד֖וֹת <S%H3027><s%> parts בֶּעָרִֽים׃ <S%H5892><s%> [to dwell] in [other] cities

וַֽיְבָרֲכ֖וּ <S%H1288><s%> blessed הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> the men הַמִּֽתְנַדְּבִ֔ים <S%H5068><s%> that willingly offered לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> themselves to dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem פ

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> now these רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> Now these [are] the chief הַמְּדִינָ֔ה <S%H4082><s%> of the province אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וּבְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> but in the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יָֽשְׁב֞וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בַּאֲחֻזָּתוֹ֙ <S%H272><s%> in his possession בְּעָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5892><s%> in their cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> [to wit] Israel הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֣ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וְהַנְּתִינִ֔ים <S%H5411><s%> and the Nethinims וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> and the children עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> servants שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon's

וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> And at Jerusalem יָֽשְׁב֔וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [certain] of the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and of the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children יְ֠הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עֲתָיָ֨ה <S%H6265><s%> Athaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֻזִּיָּ֜ה <S%H5818><s%> of Uzziah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זְכַרְיָ֧ה <S%H2148><s%> of Zechariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲמַרְיָ֛ה <S%H568><s%> of Amariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁפַטְיָ֥ה <S%H8203><s%> of Shephatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַהֲלַלְאֵ֖ל <S%H4111><s%> of Mahalaleel מִבְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children פָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H6557><s%> of Perez

וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֣ה <S%H4641><s%> And Maaseiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> of Baruch בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כָּל־ חֹ֠זֶה <S%H3626><s%> of Colhozeh בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲזָיָ֨ה <S%H2382><s%> of Hazaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲדָיָ֧ה <S%H5718><s%> of Adaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹיָרִ֛יב <S%H3114><s%> of Joiarib בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> of Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַשִּׁלֹנִֽי׃ <S%H8023><s%> of Shiloni

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> All the sons פֶ֕רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Perez הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> [were] four מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> threescore וּשְׁמֹנָ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H582><s%> men חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> valiant ס

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the sons בִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin סַלֻּ֡א <S%H5543><s%> Sallu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֡ם <S%H4918><s%> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹעֵ֡ד <S%H3133><s%> of Joed בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פְּדָיָה֩ <S%H6305><s%> of Pedaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son ק֨וֹלָיָ֧ה <S%H6964><s%> of Kolaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַעֲשֵׂיָ֛ה <S%H4641><s%> of Maaseiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִֽיתִיאֵ֖ל <S%H384><s%> of Ithiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְשַֽׁעְיָֽה׃ <S%H3470><s%> of Jesaiah

וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> And after גַּבַּ֣י <S%H1373><s%> him Gabbai סַלָּ֑י <S%H5543><s%> Sallai תְּשַׁ֥ע <S%H8672><s%> nine מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight

וְיוֹאֵ֥ל <S%H3100><s%> And Joel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> of Zichri פָּקִ֣יד <S%H6496><s%> [was] their overseer עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> command וִיהוּדָ֧ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַסְּנוּאָ֛ה <S%H5574><s%> of Senuah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> command הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> over the city מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <S%H4932><s%> [was] second פ
מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> From הַֽכֹּהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> Of the priests יְדַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H3048><s%> Jedaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹיָרִ֖יב <S%H3114><s%> of Joiarib יָכִֽין׃ <S%H3199><s%> Jachin

שְׂרָיָ֨ה <S%H8304><s%> Seraiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חִלְקִיָּ֜ה <S%H2518><s%> of Hilkiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשֻׁלָּ֣ם <S%H4918><s%> of Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צָד֗וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְרָיוֹת֙ <S%H4812><s%> of Meraioth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיט֔וּב <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub נְגִ֖ד <S%H5057><s%> [was] the ruler בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> And their brethren עֹשֵׂ֤י <S%H6213><s%> that did הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> the work לַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> [were] eight מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two וַ֠עֲדָיָה <S%H5718><s%> and Adaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֹחָ֤ם <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פְּלַלְיָה֙ <S%H6421><s%> of Pelaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַמְצִ֣י <S%H557><s%> of Amzi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זְכַרְיָ֔ה <S%H2148><s%> of Zechariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פַּשְׁח֖וּר <S%H6583><s%> of Pashur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַלְכִּיָּֽה׃ <S%H4441><s%> of Malchiah

וְאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> And his brethren רָאשִׁ֣ים <S%H7218><s%> chief לְאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> hundred אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty וּשְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> two וַעֲמַשְׁסַ֧י <S%H6023><s%> and Amashai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲזַרְאֵ֛ל <S%H5832><s%> of Azareel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַחְזַ֥י <S%H273><s%> of Ahasai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשִׁלֵּמ֖וֹת <S%H4919><s%> of Meshillemoth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִמֵּֽר׃ <S%H564><s%> of Immer

וַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> And their brethren גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> mighty men חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty וּשְׁמֹנָ֑ה <S%H8083><s%> and eight וּפָקִ֣יד <S%H6496><s%> and their overseer עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and זַבְדִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H2068><s%> [was] Zabdiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַגְּדוֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> of [one of] the great men ס

וּמִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> now from הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> Also of the Levites שְׁמַעְיָ֧ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַשּׁ֛וּב <S%H2815><s%> of Hashub בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַזְרִיקָ֥ם <S%H5840><s%> of Azrikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֖ה <S%H2811><s%> of Hashabiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בּוּנִּֽי׃ <S%H1138><s%> of Bunni

וְשַׁבְּתַ֨י <S%H7678><s%> And Shabbethai וְיוֹזָבָ֜ד <S%H3107><s%> and Jozabad עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <S%H4399><s%> business הַחִֽיצֹנָה֙ <S%H2435><s%> [had] the oversight of the outward לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God מֵרָאשֵׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> of the chief הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites

וּמַתַּנְיָ֣ה <S%H4983><s%> And Mattaniah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִ֠יכָה <S%H4318><s%> Micah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זַבְדִּ֨י <S%H2067><s%> of Zabdi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָסָ֜ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph רֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [was] the principal הַתְּחִלָּה֙ <S%H8462><s%> to begin יְהוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> the thanksgiving לַתְּפִלָּ֔ה <S%H8605><s%> in prayer וּבַקְבֻּקְיָ֖ה <S%H1229><s%> and Bakbukiah מִשְׁנֶ֣ה <S%H4932><s%> the second מֵאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> among his brethren וְעַבְדָּא֙ <S%H5653><s%> and Abda בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שַׁמּ֔וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> of Shammua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גָּלָ֖ל <S%H1559><s%> of Galal בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son [יְדִיתוּן כ] (יְדוּתֽוּן׃ <S%H3038><s%> Jeduthun ק)

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> All the Levites בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> [were] two hundred שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> fourscore וְאַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <S%H702><s%> and four פ

וְהַשּֽׁוֹעֲרִים֙ <S%H7778><s%> Moreover the porters עַקּ֣וּב <S%H6126><s%> Akkub טַלְמ֔וֹן <S%H2929><s%> Talmon וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> and their brethren הַשֹּׁמְרִ֣ים <S%H8104><s%> that kept בַּשְּׁעָרִ֑ים <S%H8179><s%> the gates מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy וּשְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> and two

וּשְׁאָ֨ר <S%H7605><s%> And the residue יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> [and] the Levites בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> [were] in all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> in his inheritance

וְהַנְּתִינִ֖ים <S%H5411><s%> But the Nethinims יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בָּעֹ֑פֶל <S%H6077><s%> in Ophel וְצִיחָ֥א <S%H6727><s%> and Ziha וְגִשְׁפָּ֖א <S%H1658><s%> and Gispa עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge הַנְּתִינִֽים׃ <S%H5411><s%> [were] over the Nethinims פ

וּפְקִ֤יד <S%H6496><s%> The overseer הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> also of the Levites בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem עֻזִּ֤י <S%H5813><s%> [was] Uzzi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בָּנִי֙ <S%H1137><s%> of Bani בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> of Hashabiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַתַּנְיָ֖ה <S%H4983><s%> of Mattaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִיכָ֑א <S%H4316><s%> of Micha מִבְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons אָסָף֙ <S%H623><s%> of Asaph הַמְשֹׁ֣רְרִ֔ים <S%H7891><s%> the singers לְנֶ֖גֶד <S%H5048><s%> [were] over מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> the business בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִצְוַ֥ת <S%H4687><s%> commandment הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> For [it was] the king's עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> concerning וַאֲמָנָ֥ה <S%H548><s%> concerning them that a certain portion עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <S%H7891><s%> should be for the singers דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> due י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for every day בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3117><s%> day
